data.message:
You know you rappers kill me, you rap About the "struggle" then you get pay days for couple hundred thousand a show. See, Dre,cube hit smart and found an exit out the business , got into shownbusiness and provides , make 5 times more,,, no more yea we all grew up with cold showers,, I pretended Mc
Donald's was in my trailer room closet every night... So what. I like living day by day, it's American.
